text: Tambov Oblast (, Tambovskaya oblast) is a federal subject of Russia. Specifically, it is an oblast. Its administrative center (capital city) is the city of Tambov. As of the 2010 Census, its population was 1,091,994. == Demographics == Population: ; Ethnic groups (2010): * Russians: 97% * Ukrainians: 0.7% * Armenians: 0.4% * Romani people: 0.4% * Others: 1.5% === Largest cities and towns === == References == == Other websites == * Official website of Tambov Oblast * Photos of Tambov and Tambov Oblast *
title: Tambov Oblast
